languages.text: {n}Кибелла склоняет голову. Затем поднимает на вас потеплевший взгляд.{/n} "Здесь, наверху, в вашей крови еще жива жажда того, что мой культ почитает за слабость. Связи. Близости. Я понимаю, но не нуждаюсь в том. Однако, благодарю, что ты предложил{mf||а} их". {n}Воительница встряхивается, словно набрасывая на плечи привычный покров отчужденности.{/n} "Но нам пора вернуться на стезю, каждому на свою. Благодарю тебя".

traits.locale_text: "И я ценю время, что ты уделил{mf||а} мне. И твой ответ на мой вопрос". {n}Культистка встряхивается, словно набрасывая на плечи привычный покров отчужденности.{/n} "Но время, уделенное этому визиту, уже на исходе. Нам пора вернуться на стезю, каждому на свою. Благодарю тебя".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."

Однако, благодарю, что ты предложил{mf||а} их". {n}Воительница встряхивается, словно набрасывая на плечи привычный покров отчужденности.{/n} "Но нам пора вернуться на стезю, каждому на свою. Благодарю тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head. Then she looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, your blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness. Attachments. Intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And still, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness on her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own way. Thank you."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah agacha la cabeza, pero después te dedica una mirada cálida.{/n} «Aquí, en lo más alto, la sangre de todos aún contiene el deseo de lo que mi culto considera debilidad: los vínculos y la intimidad. Lo entiendo, pero carezco de esa necesidad. Aun así, estoy agradecida por la oferta». {n}Se sacude ligeramente, como si colocara su habitual capa de indiferencia sobre los hombros.{/n} «Ahora debemos volver a nuestros respectivos hilos. Gracias».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. Gracias».

languages.text: {n}キベラは頭を下げ、それからあたたかな目であなたを見上げる。{/n}「ここ、上層では、誰もが私の教団が弱点とみなすもの、つまり愛着や親密さへの渇望をいまだに持ち続けている。それは理解できるが、私には必要のないものよ。とはいえ、申し出には感謝しているわ」{n}彼女はおなじみの、よそよそしさのマントを肩から羽織るように、わずかに身を震わせる。{/n}「そろそろそれぞれの糸に戻った方がよさそうね。ありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは頭を下げ、それからあたたかな目であなたを見上げる。{/n}「ここ、上層では、誰もが私の教団が弱点とみなすもの、つまり愛着や親密さへの渇望をいまだに持ち続けている。それは理解できるが、私には必要のないものよ。とはいえ、申し出には感謝しているわ」{n}彼女はおなじみの、よそよそしさのマントを肩から羽織るように、わずかに身を震わせる。{/n}「そろそろそれぞれの糸に戻った方がよさそうね。ありがとう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈低下了头，随后抬起头看着你，目光中带着暖意。{/n}“即便是在这里，在人群的顶端，人们的血脉依旧渴求依恋，渴求亲密。我的教派认为这些是人类的弱点。我能理解你的意思，但我并不需要这些。话虽如此，我仍然很感谢你的邀请。”{n}她轻轻抖了抖身子，仿佛要把冷漠的外表重新披在身上，像披起一件熟悉的斗篷一样。{/n}“现在，我们必须回到各自的丝线上了。谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈低下了头，随后抬起头看着你，目光中带着暖意。{/n}“即便是在这里，在人群的顶端，人们的血脉依旧渴求依恋，渴求亲密。我的教派认为这些是人类的弱点。我能理解你的意思，但我并不需要这些。话虽如此，我仍然很感谢你的邀请。”{n}她轻轻抖了抖身子，仿佛要把冷漠的外表重新披在身上，像披起一件熟悉的斗篷一样。{/n}“现在，我们必须回到各自的丝线上了。谢谢你。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah senkt ihren Kopf und blickt dich dann freundlich an.{/n} "Hier, an der Spitze, sehnen sich alle nach etwas, das mein Kult als Schwäche betrachtet: Nähe, Intimität. Ich verstehe das, brauche es aber nicht. Trotzdem danke ich Euch für das Angebot." {n}Sie schüttelt sich leicht, als würde sie in einen vertrauten Mantel der Distanziertheit schlüpfen.{/n} "Wir müssen nun zu unseren eigenen Fäden zurückkehren. Danke."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah senkt ihren Kopf und blickt dich dann freundlich an.{/n} "Hier, an der Spitze, sehnen sich alle nach etwas, das mein Kult als Schwäche betrachtet: Nähe, Intimität. Ich verstehe das, brauche es aber nicht. Trotzdem danke ich Euch für das Angebot." {n}Sie schüttelt sich leicht, als würde sie in einen vertrauten Mantel der Distanziertheit schlüpfen.{/n} "Wir müssen nun zu unseren eigenen Fäden zurückkehren. Danke."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah baisse la tête avant de lever vers vous un regard empreint de chaleur.{/n} « Ici, dans les hautes sphères, le sang de tous aspire encore à ce que mon culte voit comme une faiblesse : l'attachement, la proximité. Si je peux le comprendre, pour ma part, je vis très bien sans. Mais je vous remercie pour votre offre. » {n}Elle s'agite légèrement, comme pour jeter sur ses épaules la cape d'indifférence dont elle ne se sépare jamais.{/n} « L'heure est venue de reprendre nos fils respectifs. Merci. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."

Merci. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah başını eğiyor. Ardından sıcak bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Buradaki, tam zirvedeki herkesin kanı; tarikatımın zayıflık olarak gördüğü arzularla akıyor. Bağ kurma, yakınlık... Ne olduklarını anlasam da onlara ihtiyacım yok. Yine de teklifin için minnettarım." {n}Omuzlarından aşina olduğu bir yalnızlık pelerinini atıyormuş gibi hafifçe silkeleniyor.{/n} "Artık ikimiz de kendi ipliklerimize dönmeliyiz. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah lowers her head, then looks up at you with warmth.{/n} "Here, at the top, everyone's blood still carries a craving for what my cult sees as weakness: attachments, intimacy. I understand, but I have no need for them. And yet, I am grateful for the offer." {n}She shakes herself slightly, as if throwing a familiar cloak of aloofness over her shoulders.{/n} "We must now return each to our own thread. Thank you."
